sentences.en: Can I do a quadruple back flip?
sentences.cn: 我能连坐四个后空翻 吗 ?

sentences.en: Direction of further improving the performance of quadruple - twist yarn was brought forward.
sentences.cn: 对四倍捻纱线性能进一步改善提出了方向.

sentences.en: Few would bet against him completing a golden quadruple after his French Open and Wimbledon triumphs.
sentences.cn: 很少有人可以打败他去赢得金牌了,在此之前他已经得到法国公开赛和温布尔登的冠军了.

sentences.en: Food prices quadrupled during the war.
sentences.cn: 战争期间食品价格翻了两番。

sentences.en: God sighed and created quadruple bypass surgery.
sentences.cn: 上帝叹息了并产生了显微心脏手术.

sentences.en: Halving the repeater spacing made it possible to quadruple the bandwidth.
sentences.cn: 把增音机间隔缩小一半,就能使带宽增加三倍.

sentences.en: How can we quadruple the GNP with such meagre imports and exports?
sentences.cn: 这么一点进出口,就能实现翻两番 呀 ?

sentences.en: It was not just double meaning , but quadruple meaning!
sentences.cn: 这喑喻不但是双重, 更是四重暗喻!

sentences.en: Its GDP will quadruple the 2000 volume, exceeding $ 4 trillion by 2020.
sentences.cn: 到2020年国内生产总值比2000年翻两番, 达到4万亿美元以上.

sentences.en: Masonry works of oven bottom and quadruple - arch wall.
Quadruple rhythm has four beats per measure.
Several times, the final figure was quadruple what was first reported.
sentences.cn: 最终数据曾几次达到最初报告数据的四倍.

sentences.en: The company has quadrupled its profits in just three years.
sentences.cn: 公司利润在短短三年里增长至原来的四倍。

sentences.en: The power utilities will need to quadruple their capacity.
sentences.cn: 电力事业必须使它们的能力增加三倍.

sentences.en: The subjects were given quadruple the normal dosage of the drug.
sentences.cn: 让实验对象服用了四倍于正常剂量的药物。

sentences.en: They could sell their merchandise for quadruple the asking price.
sentences.cn: 他们能够以4倍于要价的价钱出售他们的商品。

sentences.en: We are confident that we can quadruple the GNP by the end of this century.
sentences.cn: 对到本世纪末达到国民生产总值翻两番的目标,我们是有信心的.

sentences.en: We have hope to quadruple the total industrial and agricultural output by the end of the century, which is a lofty aim.
sentences.cn: 我们有雄心壮志,到本世纪末, 使工农业生产总值翻两番.

trans.tran_cn: 四重的，四倍的，由四部份组成的
trans.tran_en: four times as big or as many
to increase and become four times as big or as high, or to make something increase in this way
